item.title: Blog Action Day For A Less Toasty Tomorrow
item.description: Is it hot in there, or is it just me? Hold on to your hats, folks, because global warming is here, and it’s not waiting for anyone. We’re already seeing the effects, despite what some people might believe. Forget those freezing Midwest winters; the Arctic Ocean is melting at an alarming rate, opening up shipping routes and sparking international interest in its resources. It seems like everywhere you look, there’s evidence of climate change, from California wildfires to polar bears struggling to stay afloat.
